item.title: #en @ 1491204055045394433
item.description:
Nothing but respect for all the good people working behind the scenes to collect and put out the data.
I do wish Manitoba was more willing to embrace an open data approach with COVID data generally. Openness builds trust, and we could stand to build more trust right now.
